componentDescription: A panel that slides in from the screen edge, showing content or controls without navigating away.

placement.description: Defines the position from which the drawer will appear (e.g., 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

size.description: Specifies the width or height of the drawer, depending on its placement.

isOpen.description: Controls the visibility state of the drawer; `true` for open, `false` for closed.

onClose.description: Callback function invoked when the drawer is requested to close, typically by clicking the overlay or a close button.

isClosePrevented.description: If `true`, prevents the drawer from closing when the overlay is clicked or the escape key is pressed.

children.description: The content to be rendered inside the drawer component.
